title: Facing Adversity... & Booing Crowds
description:
Welcome back to another episode of In the Crease! In today's episode, Linda and Emily give their insights and opinions on how the season has started. With that being said, they address fans booing, players getting injured, and schedules getting tougher. After that, it's story time; Linda gives her favorite hockey moment and the ladies give you plenty of reasons to tune into this weekend's games (especially the Kraken home opener where they are both going to be in Seattle)!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda and Emily talk everything from fans booing to injury updates and more!
